members.name: load
members.doc:
Loads data from a URL as plain text.

// Load data synchronously.
var data = CKEDITOR.ajax.load( 'somedata.txt' );
alert( data );

// Load data asynchronously.
var data = CKEDITOR.ajax.load( 'somedata.txt', function( data ) {
    alert( data );
} );

params.name: url
params.doc: The URL from which the data is loaded.

params.name: callback
params.doc: A callback function to be called on data load. If not provided, the data will be loaded synchronously.

return.name: return
return.doc: The loaded data. For asynchronous requests, an empty string. For invalid requests, null.

members.short_doc: Loads data from a URL as plain text. ...

members.name: loadXml
members.doc:
Loads data from a URL as XML.

// Load XML synchronously.
var xml = CKEDITOR.ajax.loadXml( 'somedata.xml' );
alert( xml.getInnerXml( '//' ) );

// Load XML asynchronously.
var data = CKEDITOR.ajax.loadXml( 'somedata.xml', function( xml ) {
    alert( xml.getInnerXml( '//' ) );
} );

params.name: url
params.doc: The URL from which the data is loaded.

params.name: callback
params.doc: A callback function to be called on data load. If not provided, the data will be loaded synchronously.

return.name: return
return.doc: An XML object storing the loaded data. For asynchronous requests, an empty string. For invalid requests, null.

members.short_doc: Loads data from a URL as XML. ...

members.name: post
members.doc:
Creates an asynchronous POST XMLHttpRequest of the given url, data and optional contentType. Once the request is done, regardless if it is successful or not, the callback is called with XMLHttpRequest#responseText or null as an argument.

CKEDITOR.ajax.post( 'url/post.php', 'foo=bar', null, function( data ) {
    console.log( data );
} );

CKEDITOR.ajax.post( 'url/post.php', JSON.stringify( { foo: 'bar' } ), 'application/json', function( data ) {
    console.log( data );
} );

params.name: callback
params.doc: A callback executed asynchronously with XMLHttpRequest#responseText or null as an argument, depending on the status of the request.

members.short_doc: Creates an asynchronous POST XMLHttpRequest of the given url, data and optional contentType. ...
